jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
With a loud thud a pack of syringes drops from the chimney
The slit closes onto Scott’s fingers
Kate opens doors, startling Nick
Tony has abrupt flashbacks of Kate falling
A creature jumps towards the phone camera
“I see you” message appears on the TV
Abrupt jump cut with a sound effect
Nick jumps onto Tony
TV explodes
Tony breaks through the glass pane
An emergency vehicle rushes past
A woman’s face appears through shelving
A woman grabs Chris from behind
A zombie man jumps into frame
The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him
A zombie grabs man from the shadows
A man emerges from behind rock
The head of a dead man becomes visible
Wendy opens tent. Accompanied by sound effect
A quick jump-cut to a shot of the dead man’s face
A man startles Wendy
Several quick flashes of dead bodies face
Wendy turns to see the dead man standing beside her
A voice suddenly speak from the radio
A sound is heard in the distance
An unexpected sound is played
A man grabs Wendy’s leg
A bear appears behind Wendy
Marc suddenly brakes the van after hearing a noise
Marc looks up to the car window and a man is on the other side watching him, which causes him to scream
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
A man suddenly attacks Hernandez from behind
The sound of a gunshot and a bullet hitting a wall right next to Phoenix
A hand smashes through a glass door and grabbing a thug from behind
The blind man attacks a thug from behind
The blind man hits a thug from behind
The dog suddenly lurches out of nowhere and barks
Phoenix is grabbed by a thug
As Alice is looking at Margaret, there is a sudden cut to someone’s face in the darkness, and a male voice hums a melody
A sudden cut to some blurred imagery of lights in a darkened room
A sudden cut to footage of female dancers reflected in a distorted mirror
As Margaret’s husband pulls the curtain, there is a brief flash of some face with wide open eyes for 2 frames
A sudden cut to footage of twitching dancers in disturbing makeup
Another cut to the same footage of dancers in makeup, closer to the camera this time, as the eerie music becomes louder
Another cut to the same dancers in disturbing makeup, now up close and with one of them lunging at the camera. A second later, Alice wakes up from a nightmare
A sudden cut to a closeup of an opening eye
Another cut to the same eye
An extended creepy sequence of visions begins
A face in disturbing makeup suddenly appears in the foreground, and Alice jolts awake in the bathtub
Brianna Gets a jolt of electricity to her face, knocking her over
Nathan steps on a tile that moves
Nathan steps on a tile, activating the lasers
Turnbull looks up and the camera quickly pans to reveal the ghost girl standing outside the car window
As the camera pans up from a woman’s feet, it cuts to a different screaming woman just before it gets to her face
Terry spots a corpse in the water which startles her
The corpse’s head suddenly turns towards Terry
While walking through the darkness, the tortured girl suddenly comes into Terry’s view

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan

jump_scares.spoiler: An apparition of a young Jason emerges from a mirror
Jason punches through a bathroom door and grabs one of the students
A crew member surprises Mr. McCulloch and a jump scare sound effect can be heard
Jason surprises Rennie and Sean by knocking over some boxes (and other stuff)
The police officer lying on the ground suddenly gasps
In the distance someone shouts ‘Hawkins’, accompanied by a sound cue
Police officers searching the house get startled by each other
Michael suddenly runs in from the right and attacks the police officer
A hand suddenly smashes the lightbulb in the bathroom
A hand smashes through a window and grabs the old man by the head
Michael stabs a lady in the neck with a fluorescent lightbulb
A person in the back seat starts moving and Vanessa screams
The house front door slams shut
The girl on the floor comes alive and screams
A bloody mask lands on the car windshield
A bullet hits the car window,
A hand reaches down from on top of the car and grabs Marion
Marcus tries to leave the car but is pushed back in by Michael
Michael stabs Marcus in the eye
While being shot at by Vanessa, Michael pushes open the car door which hits Vanessa’s gun, causing her to shoot herself
After a quiet and intense scene, a hospital door is opened loudly
Michael appears behind Big John and stabs him in the armpit
A gunshot is heard from inside the house
Michael storms out of the closet
Michael comes back to life and stabs the police officer
Michael suddenly appears behind Karen
A hand grabs Julia by her leg
One of Frank’s bodies falls through as door as Kirsty approaches
Kirsty reaches into the box but is suddenly zapped as her hand gets close
Kirsty opens a closet and a Jesus sculpture falls out
A demon appears over Kirsty’s shoulder

movies.title: Harvested 2 – The Legend of Harold Rice

jump_scares.spoiler: Girl appears in kitchen
Woman sleeping on couch and monster appears
Girl on her phone and monster appears behind her
Killer grabs a victim from behind
Killer stabs victim
A corpse on a gurney sits up
Box 27 is opened, revealing the body of the man who was recently murdered
The guillotine blade drops
Professor Jarod’s face peels away
A shadowy figure appears behind Meera
There is a loud gunshot
A barking dog lunges at the car window
A car horn sounds and a car crashes into Meera
Meera looks up to see a masked man pointing a gun at her
A hand suddenly knocks on the car window
A picture falls off a cabinet
Meera switches on a light to reveal a person tied to a chair
Christina suddenly wakes up and Meera screams
Meera turns around to run and immediately runs into Henry
Henry suddenly grabs Meera by the shoulder and throws her
Meera suddenly Strikes Henry from behind
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
Footage of a woman running from the killers (starts with a classic jump scare sound)
A bit more footage of the killers’ victim (also starting loudly, to startle the audience)
The same victim crying for help as she’s surrounded by her attackers
Justine is startled by a fellow student near the lockers area
A car engine revs, accompanied by a jump scare sound, as Justine exits a store
As Justine is driving and has her eyes on the road again: a jump scare sound when she notices a car motionless in the middle of the road
Another jump scare sound as Justine is walking down a hallway and the lights go out for a moment
A mystery person walks past one of the dorm rooms in the dark (accompanied by a jump scare sound effect)
The woman with the hoodie (that Justine met at the store) suddenly appears in front of Justine
One of the killers shows up onscreen
The campus security guard is attacked by one of the killers
Violet (hoodie woman) jumps in front of Justine
Another member of the group of killers appears in the hallway as Justine is running away
One of the killers “jumps in” a static shot, attempting to surprise Justine (this is one of the loudest jump scare sounds of the movie)
Justine’s friend Scott appears from an adjacent room and wielding a shotgun (yet another classic jump scare sound effect)
Scott is grabbed by one of the killers as soon as he opens the front door of his own place
(Yet) another jump scare sound effect as it’s shown that one of the killers is watching Justine from a distance
Justine reaches the edge of a rooftop and when she turns around: all the killers have caught up to her
One of the killers rushes past Aaron’s car
A girl is stabbed up through the bottom of her chin
The sound of a door slamming shut
Hiding under a car, Frank suddenly cuts a girl’s Achilles tendon as she comes close
Anna’s friend Martin is suddenly sliced with a cleaver through his mouth and face
Martin, who we presume is dead at the time, suddenly hits Frank with a baseball bat
As Frank opens his van door, Anna, presumed to be still out cold, suddenly stabs him
The small lizard is suddenly grabbed and eaten by a different, much larger type of lizard
When Jonas looks to his left, the megalodon suddenly appears next to the submersible
Someone grabs Jonas by the shoulder
A previously unseen large eel suddenly leaps at the character’s helmet, shown from his POV
A shoal of fish startles the characters
A lizard suddenly appears in front of Jonas, shown from his POV, and lunges at him
The megalodon rams the glass wall behind the speaking character, shattering it
A megalodon suddenly appears and swallows the boat with the mercenaries
Something rams the boat, startling its passengers

movies.title: My Heart Can’t Beat Unless You Tell It To

jump_scares.spoiler: Jessie shoves the table suddenly and storms off
Someone breaks the car’s window
Zoe lunges at Benny from outside the frame
A crossbow shot suddenly hits the hood of the car
Benny’s grandmother appears from behind a corner with a yell and swings a bat at him
During a quiet moment, Zoe suddenly opens the door in the foreground, making noise
Right as Benny attempts to take a swing, someone grabs the bat from behind
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
The shower curtain is pulled aside revealing a person with long blonde hair holding a knife
A blonde woman runs toward Mr. Arbogast and attacks him with a knife
Lila turns around suddenly and gasps
Lila turns the chair around revealing a preserved dead body
Greta is surprised by Malcolm
Greta is pulled into the family portrait before waking from a nightmare
The attic door suddenly closes trapping Greta inside
Greta sees a figure causing her to scream and fall down
The attic stairs pull up as Greta and Malcolm are talking
During another nightmare, Brahms’ head suddenly snaps back after Greta moves it
A mirror shatters beside Cole
As Greta and Malcolm try to escape they run into Brahms
Greta goes to open a door and Brahms is standing behind it
Greta sees something move while looking through a gap
Brahms breaks through a wall behind Greta and Malcolm
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
A door slams
A load noise as Elliot enters the room through a beaded curtain may startle some viewers
After Elliot says “The Bye Bye Man” there is a high pitched screaming noise and the candle blows out
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, Elliot sees a dog walking across a doorway
The coat hanging on the wall suddenly morphs into the Bye Bye Man who walks towards Elliot
The lecturer slams his book on John’s desk
During a tense scene (where the Bye Bye Man sits closer and closer to Elliot), the librarian suddenly appears in front of Elliot and starts yelling at him
The Bye Bye Man suddenly appears in the reflection of the shop window
Sasha looks at the detective’s face and her eyes and mouth are covered in blood
Mrs Redmon yells out “leave”
Elliot turns around and the librarian is standing directly in front of his car
John turns around and sees a bloodied Kim standing in front of him
A young girl sees her parents is bed with blood coming out of their eyes and mouth
The title credits appearing on the screen accompanied by a sound effect may startle some
A door opens loudly
After seeing water drip on the floor, Carlos looks up and La Llorona is hovering right above him
La Llorona suddenly runs out of the shadows and grabs Chris around the arm
As Chris shuts the car door, La Llorona appears at the window
The car lock suddenly pops up
Sam lifts the umbrella out of the water and La Llorona suddenly appears in front of her
An unseen force suddenly pushes the door open as Anna holds Chris
The alarm clock suddenly goes off
La Llorona suddenly rushes at Chris from behind the curtains
La Llorona comes out of the room behind Chris and tackles him
La Llorona pushes Sam under the water
Chris points and says “Mom”, causing Anna to look around and see La Llorona’s face right beside her
There is a loud roar from upstairs
Anna and the childen look up to see La Llorona towering above them
The figure under the tablecloth suddenly rushes at the children
The glass behind Rafael suddenly cracks
An unseen force hurls Sam backwards
A shrieking La Llorona suddenly swims at Anna as she approaches Sam
As the sheet drops to reveal La Llorona’s reflection, the glass shatters and she screams at the children
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
The old lady groans and appears suddenly beside Mun
Mun walks slowly down a corridor, as she approaches a light there is a rattling noise behind her
A woman suddenly appears while Mun is learning calligraphy. She asks “why are you sitting on my chair?” and lunges at Mun. [Video]
An elderly man appears in the lift with Mun
Mun sees a dark figure standing behind Ying Ying
A piece of masonry falls to the floor in front of the camera
A chair slides along the floor
The windows in the truck shatter
A fisherman is suddenly impaled by a knife
The glass on the clock breaks
Father Malone appears from the shadows startling Kathy
Static hisses from the radio
A cupboard opens startling Elizabeth
A corpse falls onto Elizabeth
The piece of driftwood suddenly sparks and catches fire
The fisherman suddenly collapses as he approaches Elizabeth
Accompanied by a sound effect, a large hairy arm reaches out and grabs Dan while he stands by the door
A figure appears in the doorway by Mrs. Kobritz
One of the revenants can be seen watching the car from a distance
A hand breaks through one of the windows in the church
Stevie is suddenly attacked by one of the revenants
Skeletor suddenly appears beside Isaiah
Skeletor appears behind a man trying to pry open the ATM
As Isiah rounds a corner he bumps into Kels and his gang
As Isiah walks down a dark corridor, a man with his face covered appears behind him
Skeletor grabs Nya from behind as she looks at her phone
After Isiah and Nya fist bump, a man in a mask suddenly appears in front of them
An arm reaches out to grab Nya as she walks up the church steps
A knife blade barely misses Nya as the group runs past a construction sign
The hairdresser’s chair that Samantha is sitting on suddenly drops down
A large stone shoots off the lawnmower and goes through Samantha’s eye
George puts his hand on Nick’s shoulder
An ambulance suddenly slams into George
Matt sees a frightening vision in a basement window
A figure can be seen in a mirror as Sara opens a closet door
Matt turns around to see that the water Sara is mopping the floor with has turned to blood
Some plates fall on the floor and break
Matt gets a shock from the door in the basement
Matt has a vision where his hand sinks through a pillar and gets stuck in rotting meat
Matt begins to have another vision
Sara turns around and is surprised by Matt standing in the doorway
A figure runs past Matt
The door slams behind Matt
One of the corpses in the mortuary begins to move
Several of the tattooed corpses are now standing around Matt
Matt sits up and comes face to face with a burnt figure

Matt starts to have another vision involving Jonah and Aickman
Wendy wakes up as a bird hits the window
As Wendy goes to lift a sheet covering the bird, a foot suddenly appears in view
Sara turns on the bed-side light and sees a corpse standing in front of her. [Video]
The furnace door shuts as Nicholas tries to examine it
Jonah’s spirit suddenly moves closer to Sara and Matt
Jonah’s spirit now stands right behind Sara and Matt
Nicholas looks in the rear view mirror and sees a burnt corpse
A corpse flashes up on the screen during a flash-back to Jonah
The shower curtain suddenly wraps itself around Wendy
An axehead breaks through the door in front of Wendy
A corpse falls down in front of Matt and Sara
A hooded man walks past Liz in a corridor
There is an abrupt flashback to the four students partying in the shelter
Liz is startled by a knock at the door

movies.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman in the corner of the room suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lisa lies down on the bed and her daughter Heidi is revealed to be standing behind her
Andy opens the door and sees a raccoon standing there
Lisa pokes at the bush with a rake and sees a decomposing corpse. [Video]
Lisa sees a woman sitting by the bathtub
Lisa sees a blood covered hand move through the water
During a tense scene, the lights and radio turn back on
A shadowy figure watches Lisa in the kitchen
The decomposing corpse appears directly in front of Lisa as she opens her eyes. [Video]
Joyce sees the silhouette of a woman walking through the trees
Mr Gordy puts his hand on Heidi’s shoulder
Heidi suddenly sees an African American man swinging on the previously empty swing
Heidi sees someone hanging from a tree
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa turns around in bed and sees an African American woman with white eyes looking at her
As Lisa approaches the bathtub, the mummified corpse comes into view
During a vision, Joyce sees Heidi briefly take on a skeletal appearance
Heidi is woken by a loud thump
Heidi sees the spirit of an African American woman pass in front of her as she enters the piano room
A photo-frame with a picture of Heidi in it cracks
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa lies back down and sees a skeleton lying in bed beside her. [Video]
Something walks past Heidi while she is stuck in the hole
The mummified corpse appears in front of Heidi
The light beside Andy crackles, briefly startling him. As Andy walks back inside, a silhouette of a man can be seen watching him
Joyce sees a corpse-like figure appear at the trailer window
The rotting corpse of the stationmaster appears at the car window beside Heidi. [Video]
A man appears behind Lisa while she is looking in a cupboard
While driving Andy sees a female ghost standing on the road, causing him to swerve
Lisa looks back at Joyce who briefly appears as a decomposing corpse
Lisa is startled by various taxidermied animals around her
A mummified body falls on Lisa
As Lisa crawls through the hole, the stationmaster grabs her around the legs
Lisa is pulled through the hole
Jim kicks The Hitcher out of the moving car
A metal sign falls over with a loud bang

The sound of tires screeching followed by a truck smashing through the closed garage door
A car rushes by on the highway

The Hitcher bangs his hand on the underside of the table and says ‘bang’
A gunshot
A gunshot
A gunshot
The rabbit gets runover by a car
The car skids as they brake to avoid a man standing in the road
John suddenly turns toward Grace in the back seat
John hits the windshield hard when Jim suddenly slams on the brakes
A hand smashes through the car window, grabbing Jim
The police officer is shot in the head
John suddenly grabs Grace while in bed
Jim is pulled in half by the truck
John slits the police officer’s throat
A bloodied hand grabs Grace as she looks in the back of the van
The camera begins to shake and there is a loud bang followed by a high pitched whining noise
Niko, wearing a pig mask, suddenly appears beside Zoe
Hands appear beneath a door during a dream Zoe is having
The previously dead dog suddenly jumps up on the table and barks
Clay is startled by a loud crash coming from another room
Clay stands up and the dog barks at him, having suddenly appeared on top of the table
The dog appears directly in front of Clay
Zoe surprises Frank while he is at his computer
Frank turns around and the previously dead Zoe now appears to be sitting up underneath the sheet
The mirror in front of Zoe cracks
Zoe opens her eyes and they are black
Zoe appears behind Niko
An unseen force pushes Niko into a cabinet
One of the shrouded bodies suddenly jumps up
The lights cut out briefly, when they come back on Zoe is standing right beside Frank
The record player suddenly turns on and begins to play opera music
Zoe appears behind Eva
Frank is shocked back to life
Accompanied by a sound effect a hand reaches out towards the camera
Accompanied by a sound effect, the silhoutte of a bird moves past a window behind Jess
As Jess looks through the window we get a quick cut to a closeup of the bird as it flies past the window once more
As Jess reaches out to pick up the toy tractor it suddenly moves towards her and a sound effect plays
A shadow moves past screen
Some ghostly legs can briefly be seen under a sheet as Denise makes the bed
An apparently dead bird suddenly squawks and flies away as Jess prods it with a piece of wood
The stairs suddenly collapse and several ghostly screams can be heard over the next minute or so
Ghostly hands reach out and grab Jess
There is a sudden transition from a quiet scene back to Jess being held back by the ghostly hands
John taps on the window
Accompanied by a sound effect, the camera suddenly zooms out
A shadowy figure moves past the screen
There is a loud bang
Ghostly hands grab Jess once more
The ghost grabs Jess around the ankle
A short, jarring flashback might startle some viewers
Accompanied by a sound effect, a figure walks past the screen
After staring at Jess for several seconds, the ghost suddenly lunges at her
There are a couple more sharp flashback cuts
Accompanied by a sound effect, Denise runs into John
The door slams shut on Jess and Bobby
The door bangs loudly as Jess approaches it
John smashes into the door from the other side causing Jess and Bobby to flee
The pitchfork comes through the door, narrowly missing Jess
John suddenly stabs Roy in the back
A hand comes out of the mud to grab Jess around the ankle
A bloodied hand comes out of the darkness startling the praying nun
The nun on the ground is pulled away into the darkness
The corpse of the nun hanging from the rope suddenly drops to the ground as a group of ravens fly away
The camera pans around Frenchie several times before a nun corpse drops from a tree knocking him to the ground
After watching a shadowy figure move across the room, Irene looks up at the statue of Jesus when Valek suddenly appears behind Irene’s shoulders and glass shatters over her
Shortly after lighting a match in the coffin, Burke hears some noises and Valek’s hands suddenly grab him and pull him down
A nun grabs Irene by the hand as she approaches the praying nuns
After Burke touches the veil of the abbess, she suddenly turns to reveal she has been possessed by Valek
After Irene picks up a bead from the floor, a nun is standing directly behind her
As Irene looks at the rosary, Valek’s hands break through the wall behind her
As a screaming Irene flees, a hand is placed over her mouth by one of the nuns
As Burke walks towards the exorcised boy, Valek suddenly appears
We see a top down shot of the nuns praying together in a circular pattern. The scene briefly goes quiet before an unseen force flings the nuns across the room
After Burke investigates the ringing noise, a hand reaches out of the ground in front of him
After Irene begins to pray a possessed nun attacks the group
Something roars at Frenchie from the darkness as he walks through the catacombs
A faceless nun appears behind Irene. As she turns around to talk to it another nun appears from the side and attacks her
Frenchie hears a noise as he moves through the group of nuns
There is another slight scare as a nun’s head jerks down behind where Frenchie is standing
As Frenchie approaches Irene she suddenly looks up and roars revealing she has been possessed
The possessed boy from the exorcism drops down behind Burke
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
Accompanied by a sound effect a bloodied man runs into view
John turns around and comes face to face with Cooper
As Jesse approaches the motel door there is a loud bang
Sarah suddenly appears in the hallway and attacks Jesse
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
During the opening title screen, we see a quote from the Egyptian Prayer of Resurrection, this fades out and a few seconds later there is a loud noise and what appears to be sparks appear on screen
Some earth falls on Jenny, Nick, and Vail
Nick shoots Vail a third time
After the plane crash we see several plastic body bags lying in a morgue when one of them (Nick) suddenly sits up
Nick looks around while sitting on the morgue table and sees the ghost of Vail behind him
Some birds screech and fly away as a man shines a torch on the mummy sarcophagus
Ahmanet suddenly attacks the rescue worker
The second rescue worker is attacked by Ahmanet
Nick sees several rats near some rubbish and suddenly a mummified hand appears in the foreground
Ahmanet tackles a man to the ground and kisses him (turning him into a corpse)
Nick is tackled as he walks into a hallway
A mummy breaks through the ambulance window and tries to grab Nick
A mummy smashes into the windscreen
Vail appears beside Nick on the bus
A mummified hand bursts out of a tomb
One of Ahmanet’s minions attacks Nick and Jenny
A body falls onto the concrete in front of Fingerling
Walter slams his fist on a metallic fence
Some birds fly up at Agatha
Mark’s son breaks a glass
A loud whirring sound and smoke appears
Sudden cut to a car flipping over
A car drives forward after being cussed out and honked at by Mark and Henry and is immediately hit by another car
Henry screams at Mark
Cut to Mark shaking up and down after seeing another version of himself
The sudden loud music might startle some viewers
The window cracks in front of Jan
As Jan is looking in the mirror, it breaks and she sees a blindfolded girl
Ellie scares Jan with a green mask while she’s reading in bed
A dramatic zoom in on the writing on the window, with sudden loud music
A strange blue light strikes next to Jan
The lightning strikes again, this time making Jan fall into the water
There is lightning, screaming and intense music during a flashback scene
Jan has a vision of the blindfolded girl
A bird screeches and flies into Jan’s face
A spooky figure suddenly shows up on the screen
A cat jumps at Jan as it screams
